channel.title: CVE Feed for MongoDB Inc. -- MongoDB Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MongoDB Inc. -- MongoDB Server

item.title: CVE-2018-20804|2024-09-17T02:10:48.220Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted applyOps invocations. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.10 andÂ MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.13.

item.title: CVE-2018-25004|2024-09-17T00:31:55.614Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to performing a specific type of query may trigger a denial of service by issuing a generic explain command on a find query. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.6 and MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.11.

item.title: CVE-2020-7925|2024-09-17T00:20:32.900Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: Incorrect validation of user input in the role name parser may lead to use of uninitialized memory allowing an unauthenticated attacker to use a specially crafted request to cause a denial of service. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.0-rc12; MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.9.

item.title: CVE-2020-7923|2024-09-17T02:27:47.252Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may cause denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries, which violate an invariant in the query subsystem's support for geoNear. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.0-rc7; MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.8 and MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.19.

item.title: CVE-2020-7928|2024-09-17T00:20:37.058Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger a read overrun and access arbitrary memory by issuing specially crafted queries. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.1; MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.9; MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.20 and MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.20.

item.title: CVE-2018-20802|2024-09-17T02:26:45.416Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries with compound indexes affecting QueryPlanner. This issue affects MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.9 and MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.3.
